block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 雨量传感器 YL-83 - 干燥时电阻无穷大 => A0 = 3.3V - 潮湿时略湿，电阻降至 <200K => A0 = 2.8-3.0V - 潮湿时非常湿，电阻降至 10K~20K => A0 = 1.7-2.2V Rain Sensor YL-83 - when dry resistance is infinity => A0 = 3.3V - wet slightly wet, resistance drop to <200K => A0 = 2.8-3.0V - wet very wet, resistance drop to 10K~20K => A0 = 1.7-2.2V
雨量传感器 YL-83 的连接 VCC - 3.3V 或 5V GND - GND D0 - 数字输出 A0 - 模拟输出 Connection for Rain Sensor YL-83 VCC - 3.3V or 5V GND - GND D0 - digital output A0 - analog output
检测雨水并在 OLED SSD1306 上显示电压 detect rain and display voltage on OLED SSD 1306
从雨量传感器 YL-83 提取模拟输出 A0 retrieve analog output, A0, from rain sensor YL-83
模拟输出 A0 analog output A0

要设置数字输出 D0，只需在传感器上滴几滴水，以弥合 2 个 PCB 轨道图案之间的几个间隙，以模拟雨水的效果。 然后慢慢转动可变电阻，直到“DO-LED”刚好亮起。如果“DO-LED”已经亮起，则先转动直到其熄灭，然后改变方向并慢慢转动直到“DO-LED”现在亮起。 要验证设置，请除去传感器上的一些水，"DO-LED"应关闭。再加一些水，"DO-LED"应该会亮起 To set the the digital output, D0, just leave several drops of water on the sensor to bridge several gaps between the 2 PCB track patterns, to simulate the effect of rain. Then slowly turn the variable resistor until the "DO-LED" just turn ON. If the "DO-LED" is already ON, then turn until it is OFF first, and then change direction and turn slowly until "DO-LED" is now. To verify the settings, remove some of the water on the sensor, and the "DO-LED" should be OFF. Add back some water, and "DO-LED" should be ON
数字输出 D0 digital output D0
验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap
